property.name: Text
property.value: Your Decepticon Shockwave, Cybertron Commander has +3 HP. If an opponent's character would be KO'd through non-attack damage -> Draw a card and discard a random card from your opponent's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per game, when your opponent's cards would cause you to scrap a card with 'Enigma' in its name from your hand -> You may instead flip this.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each of your Firecons have +1 ATK and +1 DEF.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Inferno, Fearless Firefighter has +3 HP. When your Inferno is in bot mode and defends -> You may pput a card with at least [O][U] that you flipped into your hand after the battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Darkmount, Cruel Overlord has +3 HP. When one of your Tanks becomes tapped -> Do 1 damage to an enemy character in bot or body mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Megatron, Living Weapon has +1 HP, +1 DEF in alt mode, and +1 ATK in bot mode. If your starting team was only Decepticons -> This costs 1 Star less.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Warpath, Confident Sharpshooter has +3 HP. Your Warpath, Confident Sharpshooter has Stealth while in alt mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Before the game begins -> You may reveal a Vaporize and a Ramming Speed from your deck and put them into your hand. Your Captain Starscream, Infantry, Air Commander, has +1 ATK.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Thundercrakcer, Mach Warrior has +1 DEF. Replace the text 'to a Melee enemy' on your Thundercracker, Mach Warrior with 'to an enemy character'.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your turn, put a counter on this card (Max: 4). If this has at least 1 counter on it on your turn, you may combine Sky Lynx, Autobot Shuttle, and Sky Lynx, Shuttle Transport into SKy Lynx, Magnificent Warrior. Then repair damage from Sky Lynx equal to the number of counterson this card. Then, flip this - the counters remain.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Acid Storm, Toxic Terror has +1 DEF. When your Acid Storm, Toxic Terror is in alt mode -> It has Stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Optimus Prime, Battlefield Legend has +1 HP. Once per game, while your Optimus Prime, Battlefield Legend is on the battlefield and one of your other Autobots gets KO'd -> Untap your Optimus Prime, Battlefield Legend OR attack the character KO'd your Autobot with him if he is untapped. Then, flip this.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per game, when you flip an Autobot to bot mode -> You may return Elita-1, Special Ops, Ranger from the KO area to the battlefield and repair 1 damage from her. At the end of your turn, KO her. Then, flip this.

property.name: Text
property.value: Do 2 damage to one of your Melee characters. If you do, deal 2 damage to an enemy. If this KO's a character -> Do 1 damage to each enemy.

property.name: Draft Type
property.value: Battle Card

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Weapon

property.name: Text
property.value: Put only on Rack'N'Ruin. While the upgraded character is in Bot 1 mode -> It has Bold 1. When the upgraded character flips to Bot 2 mode -> Do 1 damage to an enemy in bot or body mode.

property.name: Draft Type
property.value: Battle Card

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Utility

property.name: Text
property.value: Once during your turn you may scrap a card from your hand to move this to another one of your characters. When this is attached to a character, it gains an effect based on its faction: Autobot: Repair 2; Decepticon: +2 ATK until the end of your turn; Mercenary: Do 2 damage to an enemy Autobot or Decepticon.

property.name: Draft Type
property.value: Battle Card

property.name: Text
property.value: You may this on your turn if you go first. Do damage to an enemy equal to how many more characters you had at the beginning of the game than your opponent.

property.name: Draft Type
property.value: Battle Card

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Weapon

property.name: Text
property.value: Put only on Sky Lynx. The upgraded character has +1 ATK and Pierce 1 against non-Autobots for each counter on Starboard Entrance.

property.name: Draft Type
property.value: Battle Card

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Utility

property.name: Text
property.value: While the upgraded character has a Weapon equipped -> It has +1 ATK. While the upgraded character has an Armor equipped -> It has +1 DEF.

property.name: Draft Type
property.value: Battle Card

property.name: Text
property.value: Repair 1 damage from each Wrecker you have on the battlefield. Then, you may flip one of your Wreckers.

property.name: Draft Type
property.value: Battle Card

property.name: Text
property.value: For each Wrecker on your starting team -> Scrap the top 2 cards of your opponent's deck. For each Action scrapped this way, do 1 damage to an enemy.

property.name: Draft Type
property.value: Battle Card

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Utility

property.name: Text
property.value: Stealth. If the upgraded character takes damage -> Scrap this and draw a card.

property.name: Draft Type
property.value: Battle Card

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Armor Utility

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character defends -> Do 2 damage to the attacker. Scrap this after the battle.

property.name: Draft Type
property.value: Battle Card

property.name: Type
property.value: Upgrade - Weapon

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Starscream only. When the upgraded attacks a Melee character -> It has Pierce 3.
